sentences.en: Does George Bush possess a disarming grin, or a facetious smirk?
sentences.cn: GeorgeBush的笑,是可亲的露齿而笑, 还是滑稽的傻笑 呢 ?

sentences.en: Facetious remarks are part of his stock - in - trade.
sentences.cn: 讲俏皮话是他的拿手好戏.

sentences.en: He is so facetious that he turns everything into a joke.
sentences.cn: 他好开玩笑,把一切都变成戏谑.

sentences.en: He was so facetious that he turned everything into a joke.
sentences.cn: 他好开玩笑,把一切都变成了戏谑.

sentences.en: He was so facetious that he turned everything intoa joke.
sentences.cn: 他好开玩笑以至于把一切都变成笑料.

sentences.en: I became angry with the little boy at his facetious remarks.
sentences.cn: 我对这个小男孩过分的玩笑变得发火了.

sentences.en: It has been a triple error, he has been contradictory, rebellious and facetious.
sentences.cn: 这话有三错: 他自相矛盾! 离经叛道!哗众取宠!

sentences.en: Keep it, in any case, familiar, facetious even, rather then pedantic and portentous.
sentences.cn: 无论如何, 要使它显得很随便, 甚至滑稽可笑, 而不要显得很迂腐,夜郎自大.

sentences.en: Punning , facetious , irreverent, the funny man filled the newspapers and lighter periodicals with his material.
sentences.cn: 那位诙谐作家满嘴双关语, 逗乐话, 以不敬的态度把他的作品填满报章和比较显赫的杂志.

sentences.en: She kept interrupting our discussion with facetious remarks.
sentences.cn: 她不断用开玩笑的话干扰我们的讨论.

sentences.en: Stop being facetious. This is a serious matter.
sentences.cn: 别开玩笑了, 这是件正经的事.

sentences.en: Stop facetious . This is a serious matter.
sentences.cn: 他把这么一件严肃的事情当儿戏.

sentences.en: The woman eyed him coldly. "Don't be facetious," she said.
sentences.cn: 妇人冷冷地看着他，说道：“别没正经了。”

words.tran_cn: 诙谐的；爱开玩笑的；滑稽的

trans.tran_cn: 爱开玩笑的，轻率的，滑稽的，好笑的
trans.tran_en: saying things that are intended to be clever and funny but are really silly and annoying
